headline: 1 Super Stock Down 44% You'll Wish You'd Bought on the Dip, According to Wall Street
summary: Datadog's cloud monitoring platform is used by 30,500 businesses around the world.  The company is expanding into AI, and customers are flocking to some of its new products.  The stock is down 44% from its 2021 record high, but Wall Street is very bullish on its prospects.
